email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of wheat from Santos to Rotterdam under CFR terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 50,000 and LOA of 190m. The laycan dates are October 10-15. The starting freight quote is USD 45 per metric ton.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 45 seems a bit high based on current market rates. Could you consider a rate of USD 40 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the vessel's availability for the laycan period?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam - Revised Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

After reviewing the market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 42 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 8,000 per day, and the laycan period remains October 10-15. The OCEAN STAR is fully available for this period.

Please let me know if this revised quote meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Quote for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised quote. USD 42 per metric ton is acceptable. Could you please confirm the vessel's LOA and any additional details regarding the loading and discharge operations?

Looking forward to finalizing this shipment.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Details for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

The OCEAN STAR has an LOA of 190m, which is compatible with the port facilities at both Santos and Rotterdam. Loading operations are expected to take 3 days, and discharge operations 4 days, depending on port congestion.

If everything is in order, I will proceed with the necessary documentation to secure the vessel for your shipment.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with the documentation to secure the OCEAN STAR for our shipment. We appreciate your prompt assistance and look forward to a successful operation.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
